definition: young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)

sentences.english: Deer Antler Velvet is an adaptogen and contains Growth Factors to aid the body against the aging process.
sentences.chinese: 鹿茸所包含的生长因子可以帮助身体防止老化。

sentences.english: According to modern research, velvet antler has shown gonadotropic activity.
sentences.chinese: 根据现代医学的研究表明鹿茸具有促性腺作用。

sentences.english: The results showed that the period from antler shedding to stoping growth was about 120 days.
sentences.chinese: 测定结果表明，鹿茸从脱盘到停止生长约为120天。

sentences.english: Crossing the mountains, trading tea and salt with antlers and musks.
sentences.chinese: 跨过了千山万岭，驮走鹿茸麝香，换来盐巴茶叶。

sentences.english: The liquor contains six traditional Chinese remedies, including deer antler and tortoise shell.
sentences.chinese: 黄金酒加入了包括鹿茸和龟甲在内的六味中药。

sentences.english: This test offered an internal quality index in subsection utilization of cervus elaphus linnaeus.
sentences.chinese: 该试验为马鹿茸的分段利用提供了内在质量上的依据。

sentences.english: Yushe Pilose already has more than 20 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 榆社鹿茸已经有20多年的历史。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To make the kit to identify Cornu Cervi Pantotrichum with molecular taxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立中药材鹿茸的分子分类学鉴定试剂盒。

sentences.english: In the shed I saw antlers set out on a stand to air.
sentences.chinese: 在棚子里我看到一些鹿茸摆在一个架子上晾着。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the decreasing blood lipids effect of pilose antler capsule (PAC).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鹿茸胶囊的调脂作用。

sentences.english: But deer have antlers made of bone that are shed and replaced every year.
sentences.chinese: 但是，鹿有骨质的鹿茸，每年脱落并长出新鹿茸。

sentences.english: But deer have antlers made of bone that are shed and replaced every year.
sentences.chinese: 但是，鹿有骨质的鹿茸，每年脱落并长出新鹿茸。

sentences.english: The results showed that amino acid content of Malu antler is higher than that of the Meihua antler.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明马鹿茸的氨基酸质量分数要高于梅花鹿茸。

sentences.english: The results showed that amino acid content of Malu antler is higher than that of the Meihua antler.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明马鹿茸的氨基酸质量分数要高于梅花鹿茸。

sentences.english: The tender velvet dies and is scraped away until it hangs in tatters.
sentences.chinese: 柔嫩的鹿茸会死去和脱落直到像碎布一样挂在角上。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the decreasing blood lipids effect of pilose antler capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鹿茸胶囊的调脂作用。

definition: Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
tokay gecko (Gekko gecko), used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
